page.title: 19LIVING IN RUNCORN
page.content: I have lived in Runcorn for eight years.I like Runcorn.There is a carnival every year.My dad takes me running with him,we go on a long run for about two miles.Every Friday I go to the Shopping City with my mum.We leave my sister with my dad.I go to the library and pick four books.I sometimes go up to Big park and take my fishing net with me.We always take a bag with pop and butties.We do some fishing.Once we caught five fish, three tadpoles and seven frogs.We took them home.I go to Youth Club with my friend Jane and we have lots of fun.I have a game of Table Tennis and Badminton and sometimes I get a drink of cold milk and some sweets.Youth Club starts at 7pm and finishes at 9.30pm.
